sub_title: Financial sector regulation and risk management | Views expressed are personal.
summary:
A financial sector professional with primary expertise in regulation, regulatory policy, risk management and compliance, whose experience spans the private and public sector across several jurisdictions (EU, Belgium, Germany, Luxembourg and Croatia).
Has worked for private companies including Euroclear, State Street, Nordea, and Intesa Sanpaolo Group, and public institutions like the European Court of Auditors, the Croatian National Bank, and the Institute for International Relations. 
Has collaborated with several professional and academic institutions through lectures and research projects (e.g. Warwick University, Zagreb University, IADI-BIS, Central Banking, Risk.net, Casual Capital) and as an author and reviewer (e.g. IFLR - International Financial Law Journal, Journal of Banking Regulation).

Main expertise:
• Global and EU financial sector policies; legislative and regulatory initiatives, processes and stakeholders
• Prudential regulation: Basel II/III(/IV), CRR/CRD/BRRD, IFR/IFD, ESG and climate risk, cryptoassets
• Governance, internal control functions and risk management framework (credit, market, operational, liquidity)
• BCBS, FSB, European System of Financial Supervision (EBA, ESMA, EIOPA), European Banking Union (SSM/ECB, SRM/SRB, EDIS)
Following:
• Financial markets regulation and European CMU initiatives
• Insurance industry regulation
• AML-CFT developments
• Economic, political and social  challenges related to the financial sector (eg geopolitical risk, macroeconomic and monetary developments, fintechs, sustainability and sustainable finance, cryptocurrencies, CBDC)

Background overview:
• Regulatory horizon, regulatory watch, regulatory policy, advocacy activities (State Street – EMEA, Euroclear - EU)
• Prudential regulation – legislative activities and international harmonisation, implementation and compliance (Basel project – Croatian National Bank, Intesa Sanpaolo - PBZ)
• Financial sector supervision – preparation of ECB/SSM audit, monitoring of EBA and ESMA audits, on-site banking supervision (European Court of Auditors, Croatian National Bank)
• Risk management, project manager for ICAAP and AMA projects, compliance BLM (Intesa Sanpaolo Group – PBZ, Nordea)
• Research, lectures, writing, reviewing, advising (IFLR – International Financial Law Review, Informa - International Financial Regulation, Journal of Banking Regulation, Central Banking Training - Cambridge and Windsor Series, Risk.net - Risk Training, University of Zagreb - Faculty of Economics and Faculty of Law, Warwick University, NAPS)
